mapper.select: select rownum, b.*, coalesce(r.replycnt, 0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = #{code} order by rownum desc

select rownum, b.*, coalesce(r.replycnt, 0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = #{code} and rownum >= #{startnum} and rownum <= #{endnum} and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by rownum desc

select b.*, p.name product_name, p.content product_content, coalesce(r.replycnt,0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = 201 order by b.board_no
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board values (seq_board_no.nextval, #{member_no}, #{nickname}, #{board_category_cd}, #{product_id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{mainimage})
